name: Bhargavi Arora
feedback: Our trek to Prabalmachi and Kalavantin fort was just awesome. The journey, the scenes, the people, the bond, the vibe, and of course our trek leader, Rony, made it magical and memorable. He ensured our safety and fun throughout.

name: Ratnakar Nigade
feedback: Great team, good coordination, and enthusiastic people. Loved the trek with great nature trails. Surely would love to do more treks in the future.

name: Akshay Shinde
feedback: Parth, you're truly amazing! Thank you for making this trekking and rappelling experience the best ever. Your expertise, guidance, and positive energy made all the difference.

name: Pratik Pallewar
feedback: I had an incredible experience on the AMK Trek. Everything was well-organized with quality equipment and eco-friendly practices. Food, safety, and the overall adventure were top-class.

name: Shashank Gade
feedback: Exceptional service from booking to trip. The team was knowledgeable and flexible with our last-minute changes. Helped us choose a perfect vacation spot. Thank you!

name: Fareedudheen Ibnu Thafsal
feedback: The A.M.K trek with Kapil and Parth was a fantastic experience. Their support and friendliness made it feel like a family trip. Highly recommended!

name: Richie
feedback: Wow what a jungle trek experience! Beautiful nature surroundings. Thanks Shradha madam and Infinity Trekkers for organizing everything with safety.

name: Aniket Bagul
feedback: I have done 3 treks with Infinity Trekkers and had a fabulous experience every time. Looking forward to many more adventures!

name: Tamil Selvan
feedback: The attention to detail and seamless organization made this trip unforgettable. A special shout-out to our guide, Shraddha Pashte. Every moment was an adventure!

name: Sumedh Birhade
feedback: It was my first solo trekking trip and it was awesome. I truly enjoyed it and made new bonds of friendship.

name: Trupti Nehe
feedback: It was my first trek and I was nervous, but Parth and Shraddha Didi made me comfortable. Rappelling and rock climbing seemed easy because of their support. Thank you!

name: Sakshi Pupulwad
feedback: I had the best experience with Infinity Trekkers. The way they care for each individual is heartwarming. The food and comfort were perfect!

name: Pruthviraj Kharat
feedback: Truly a great experience with the Infinity family. I love exploring new places with them!

name: Nitin Patil
feedback: Lovely and adventurous experience! Infinity Trekkers are professional and make the journey fun. First-timers must try!

name: Aditya Parab
feedback: My first and amazing trek with Infinity Trekkers! Loved the fun games in the bus and on the trek. Thank you!

name: Muhammed Rafid
feedback: Best trekking experience I ever had. Rony is a professional and a lovely personality. Great food and experienced leaders!

name: Devesh Bhavsar
feedback: Nice experience climbing Kalavantin Durg. Our trek lead Rony Bhai was great!

name: Jatin Patil
feedback: People say AMK is easy, but you really understand only by going there. It was a challenging and beautiful trek.

name: Amol Khandagale
feedback: Excellent team Infinity Trekkers! Very well-organized and helpful trek leaders.

name: Nipen Khirsaria
feedback: Went to AMK with Kapil Ingale and the group. Had a great time throughout the journey. Definitely a memorable trip!

name: Amruta Thorat
feedback: The best experience with team infinity trekker India. Good food, proper guidance mainly sefty. Best memories create with all members. Thank you so much infinity trekker India.

name: Anbu R
feedback: Trekking leaders guidance are best..but food has to be improved

name: Vivek Malviya
feedback: My 1st tracking was very good, your communication & coordination was very good.

name: Hamdan Zubair
feedback: I have been to many treks and then I have been to AMK,it doesn't sit well with me when I count AMK with the other treks,it was that crazy and the trek leader roni is very young and mature,all the necessary precautions were taken,so all and all its a 5/5 for me.

name: Mahammad Rafi
feedback: Did the Kalavantin Pinnacle trek with Infinity Group. They're amazing people.

name: Shayne D'cunha
feedback: Great experience while doing the AMK range. Must go to guys, especially if you doing the AMK trek.

name: Nirmit Sawant
feedback: Sweet and Supportive Leaders, and more importantly kind humans. Food and Organisation very good and upto point. Highly recommended for your next weekend trek adventure...

name: Sachin Patil
feedback: I had a great time with Infinity Trekkers India team for a 2days 1 night AMK trekking. It was my first climbing trek and it wouldn't have been better than this. The trek leader was friendly and makes you aware about everything required to make the trek successful. Team Infinity provide indivisual safety equipments. The trek was an great experience, amazing food arrangements I would definitely recommend everyone to go on treks with INFINITE TREKKERS INDIA.

name: Vishwajeet Lal
feedback: Huge thanks to Infinity Trekkers for organizing the amazing Aadrai Jungle Trekk! Trekk, food and coordination were fantastic. You've truly made this a memorable milestone for us! Looking forward for more such treks

name: Harshvardhan Shinde
feedback: It was an awesome experience at the AMK trek.Special Thanks for the Parth sir,OJ sir and the entire infinity team leaders for guidence and motivation throughout the journey.More treks awaiting.

name: Jainish Jain
feedback: Had an amazing trek to Harihar Fort. Vedika and Ganesh were amazing trek leaders. The trek was smooth and without any hassle or problems, reached every point on time and explored the whole fort properly. The quality of food provided was also amazing. Jain good was made available. Will definitely keep this group in mind for other treks.

name: Deepak Koshti
feedback: best experience and guidance very goods nd friendly ‚ô•Ô∏èü´∂üèª

name: Pratiksha M
feedback: It was an amazing experience with Infinity trekkers India as I could complete one of the difficult trek AMK with them. Food was tasty, thanks to Sandeep dada. Safety precautions were taken. Trekmates were so helpful and jolly. Transportation was pretty good in remote region.Trek leaders and technical staff were Friendly and keeps everyone motivated through out trek, special thanks to Rishikesh as He was so calm and composed in every situation. Suggestion- it would be great if stay point would have been Kulang as there was more water availability and larger platue on Kulang fort which is comfortable for camping. Food was super tasty and should be distributed equally to avoid shortage.

name: Mukul Gupta
feedback: Did AMK in Feb 2024 with them. Very well organised trek and the food was great too.

name: Shantanu Kachole
feedback: The service infinity trekkers has given us so amazing I enjoyed it so much all of the staff was good with everyone. They have thought many new things to me and I will like to go with them once again .‚ù§Ô∏è‚Äçüî•üòÅ

name: Ram Madye
feedback: Had a great trek. Very experienced and friendly team with proper equipments. Food was very good and travel was also very comfortable. Spent a very lovely time. Would love to go again with them again‚ù§Ô∏è

name: R Lenin
feedback: Thank you for making my trip absolute perfection! Jivdhan Vanarlingi Valley Crossing & Rappling This trip was amazing by Organizer Infinity Trekking India and Our Leader Shraddha Pashte.Thank you for opening your home to us and making us feel like part of the family.

name: Venkatesh Kalyan
feedback: You guys are doing a tremendous job .Taking the responsibility of organising the trek and taking a group of 30 people to such an adventurous trek ensuring everyone's safety is not easy. You did a commendable job there . But the travel part is not upto the mark . Ofcourse for the minimal amount that you guys are quoting, it's justified.I would recommend you to charge more and provide a comfortable journey to and fro .

name: Samruddhi Limbhore
feedback: I did Jivdhan Vanarlingya Zipline and Rappelling trek for the first time with this team. Totally pathetic management. Committed time of leaving after trek was 2.30 pm. Its more than 8 pm and we are still stuck here. Little bit delay due to adventure activities can be understandable but this much delay is totally unacceptable. Next time please manage your participants size if it is not possible for you to collaborate with other teams and complete the trek as per schedule.

name: A Senthil Kumar
feedback: Myself senthilkumar, recently I went jividhan fort organised by infinity trekkers, they organised the treks very nice I really enjoyed actually this my first trek, I got many new friends over the trip and special appreciation to Queenüëë, she is more friendly üòä.

name: Rachana Khule
feedback: Went on several treks with infinity team. And all of them were awesome üíØ One of the best leads and experience ‚ù§Ô∏è we can get.

name: Mannu Shelar
feedback: It was the best trip I have ever had in life I enjoyed a lot it's was very adventurous the trek leaders was very good

name: Ooraj Pal
feedback: One of the best Trek in my life all credit goes to parth sir he is best Trek leader I have seen and most humble person and the food also very tasty thankyou chef Sundeep Had fun enjoyed every moment thanks alot for giving best trekking experience in life.

name: Vikas Yadav
feedback: Overall it was great experience with great leaders.

name: Waraj Chavan
feedback: The way they treat you is the best way to enjoy the trek for sure

name: Apurva Roy
feedback: I had Amazing experience i would like recommended
